sp_widget.name: OpsNews
sp_widget.template:
EDGE Connect on Workplace! - Come join us at our new EDGE Connect on Workplace DXC facebook. EDGE Connect hosted by the Global Tooling SMEs, provides a central forum for DXC discussions.
Microsoft Project/Visio license holders must provide 'intent to renew' software - DXC Technology has a new agreement with Microsoft that requires us to provide an 'intent to renew' for users who need to retain their Microsoft Project and Visio software licenses. If you have a business need to retain them, you must submit your 'intent to renew' prior to Jan. 22, 2018. ...more information.
SharePoint Manual Migrations - As part of the DXC Technology IT services integration, active ES SharePoint sites must be migrated to the DXC SharePoint environment by Sept 2018. By Feb. 1, 2018, all site owners must complete the Migration Survey on the SharePoint Dashboard. If not completed, IT will assume sites are no longer needed and they will be marked for deletion. ...more information.
Adobe software license holders must request and re-download Adobe software - All legacy Adobe software licenses will be discontinued and removed on or about March 31, 2018. Users with a business need to retain an Adobe software license must submit a request prior to March 1, 2018. ...more information.
Come join us! In the Global Tooling SME LATAM Q&A you can ask questions in Spanish, Portuguese, Mandarin, Chinese, Hindi, Kannada, Telugu or English and we will reply back in your own native language.

Also, you are invited to join our Weekly QnA Sessions:

- AMER/EMEA and Migrations for questions in English

- Latin America for questions in Spanish and Portuguese

- APAC for questions in Mandarin, Chinese, Hindi, Kannada, Telugu or English

Remember the EDGE Engineering monthly stakeholders meeting, where we present any updates we have about the tools we support, the invite is attached here
PPMC Delivery Community Forum - A placeholder where users can ask any questions they have related to PPMC. These Sessions are facilitated by PPMC Business SMEs on Second Monday of each month. More information is available here.
